person.persName: Richard Apperson, Jr. (11th District Circuit Judge)

body.p: Mount Sterling, Kentucky, circuit judge. Madison County, Kentucky, native. Son of Richard Apperson. Married to Elizabeth S. Taylor Apperson on December 5, 1854. Father of Maggie Apperson and Mary Apperson. Attended Centre College in Danville, Kentucky. Attorney in Covington, Kentucky. Served in the Mexican-American War from 1846 to 1847. Attorney in Montgomery County, Kentucky in 1860. Owned four enslaved persons in Montgomery County in 1860. Judge of the 11th Judicial District of Kentucky from 1862 to 1866.
